title: Tether was accused of fraud. Now it’s a crypto darling in Washington
summary: Tether–a cryptocurrency firm that previously settled a fraud investigation and has since endeared itself to Republican lawmakers and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick–is pushing to shape legislation that seeks to set rules for stablecoins
description: Tether–a cryptocurrency firm that previously settled a fraud investigation and has since endeared itself to Republican lawmakers and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick–is pushing to shape legislation that seeks to set rules for stablecoins
